Lejja nedda apita kiyanna. Ithin kiya kiya inne nethuwa piyawara gattanam iwarane. Eliye inna ewnta madya prakasha dila wedak ne oka hotel eka athulata gihilla kiyanna.

kiuwe hamotama eka nithiya kiyala. Eth.. - Raja paulata curfew wele pansal gane, hisa thel ganna - Loku unge, unta gotta allana unge malagewal dawas ganan. Podi unta paya 24n. - Podi unge magulakatawath 100kata wada baha habayio unge henchayiyange/ amathilage malagewal wala ... - Podi ekekta mask naththan, samaja durasthawa naththan arrest karanawa. loku unta unge malageal magul gewal, rasweem kisi awulak naha - Podi un 4-8 dena ekata hall wala nirodayanaya. eka hall ekaka inna ayata yanna thiyenne anith hall ekak madden. Mewa nirodayana madyasthana neme. CORONA farms. - Unge henchayiyo hotel wala, CCTV athuwa. - Unge black money handle karana videshikayo genna plane yawanaya. unta nirodayana naha. - PCR testing mathi amathi staff walata priorty. podi unta ida thibboth. - Eka agamaka ayata raswela agamika katayuthu puluwan kisima samaja durastha bawak nathuwa. - forces wala, hospital wala wadakarana pminissunta PPE, mask naha. Donation labena ewata wena deyak naha. Habayi deshapalakayo, henchayiyo unta N95 ewa unath oni tharam. wadakata nathi meeting, meadia conference walata mewelawe watina mask nasthi karanawa.  ekata wena ratawala janapathi, amathi kauru unath quarantine neethi kaduwoth daduwam karanawa. -

Must put them in behind the bar......

These 'Australians' can't be Australian citizens or residents unless they have gained special permission from the Australian government. There is a travel ban now that Australian citizens or residents cannot leave the country without government permission.  Is it possible for anyone to publish the names and countries of these people so that we could inform the Australian government (and other governments as relevant for the other idiots). That is the best punishment for these idiots as they would either be banned from entering these countries again, or if they are Australian visa holders and citizens and return again, they could face legal action when they return.  Sri Lankan government should inform those other governments and their embassies/high commissions in Sri Lanka about the criminal behaviour of these idiots. Otherwise, they pose a danger to Sri Lanka and to people like us (law abiding dual citizens of Sri Lanka and Australia) who want to come at some stage after organising leave for a long visit. We will also be tainted with the same brush and will not be allowed in Sri Lanka. I hope the Senior Government figures will get this idea while someone can find their details and post them on the internet if possible.
Gon katha kiyanna epa modayo..umbata rata yanna beri unata apita karanna deyak ne.. puluwannan australia wata complain karapan

Kusal,  To answer the first point in your pathetic sounding comment, I am already in Australia and I am a dual citizen of Australia and Sri Lanka :-) . I am writing this from my home office in Sydney (we are all working from home now), and earning $$$ which I have been sending to Sri Lanka over the last 25 years, and especially in the last 2 months to support around a couple of hundred people at least, through my family and friends, and various organisations. That is one of the reasons why I am staying behind. I have a good job in Australia which I can use to help Sri Lanka at this moment. The second reason for staying behind is, as same as Sri Lanka, Australia is also controlling the infection numbers through lock down measures though same as Sri Lanka, somethings worked and there were also set backs. That's to be expected in this situation. However, the point is, that everyone who has a job and citizenship/resident visas are well looked after. I am a dual citizen of Sri Lanka and Australia and travel between the two countries quite a few times every year.  Your second comment - yes I can complaint those who are treating our own Sri Lanka after leaving Australia (either due to losing jobs or for not having citizenship/resident service). I believe it is important as a step to safe-guard Sri Lankan staff who work in those hotels and also other personnel who have to deal with these idiots. Also, it will prevent others also playing this dirty game. If you are a real Sri Lankan and not one of those phonies who are already in those hotels and playing 'lords', you will also agree I am sure.  Finally, we also want to come once we can get permission to leave Australia and don't want to lose our chances simply because a few idiots believe that as they come from Australia (or US/UK etc.), they are above Sri Lankan laws.  Thank you.  Gam

Yes it is their own money but they expose our Sri Lankan staff in those hotels and the frontline health workers by their behaviour. However, if they go out to wider Sri Lankan society without getting tested, and with the same reckless attitudes and behaviours, all Sri Lanka is at risk of getting the disease if some of these people have COVID-19 or even if there carriers. So it is not about being jealous, but trying to stop spreading the virus.
